page.title: 16RECREATION
page.content: Most teenagers watch television or go out at nights,adults go to the pub or club.Most people in general like comedy,soap operas,serials,pop programmes and quizzes.A vast majority of people like interesting programmes. They also thought that there is too much sex and violence on television which influences young children.Adults thought the programs for there age group are alright but there are too many rubbish american tv programmes imported to this country.Children thought that the programmes for their age group were boring,and there are not enough.Children wanted more comedy programmes.Adults were satisfied with their programmes but some wanted less sport.
